docs.lead_paragraph: The use of deodorant soaps followed by exposure to sunlight can sometimes result in an allergic rash, according to an editorial in the current issue of the Journal of the American Medical Association.

headline.main: ALLERGIC RASHES TRACED TO SOAPS; Reaction to Deodorant Caused by Exposure to Sun

docs.abstract: AMA Journal repts use of deodorant soaps followed by exposure to sunlight may cause allergic rash; Dr Harber comments
docs.snippet: The use of deodorant soaps followed by exposure to sunlight can sometimes result in an allergic rash, according to an editorial in the current issue of the Journal of the American Medical Association.
